name: Investcorp Bank BSC
overview:
Investcorp is a leading provider and manager of alternative investment products, serving high-net-worth private and institutional clients.

Investcorp pursues a highly focused approach, specializing in five lines of business: private equity in North America and Western Europe, global hedge fund offerings, real estate investment in the United States, technology investment in North America and Western Europe and Gulf growth capital. The ability to provide multiple product offerings to our clients is one of our key competitive strengths.

Founded in 1982, Investcorp has enjoyed a track record of consistent innovation and performance, having arranged investments with a combined value of approximately $43 billion. The Company has grown to become one of the largest and most diverse alternative investment managers in terms of both product offerings and geography, and currently has approximately $12 billion in invested assets under management. The Firm co-invests significantly with its clients across its lines of business to ensure a strong alignment of interests.
